hada kampa karawana ema siduwima pilibandawa siya pramukha puwathin ratata heli kirima pilibandawa 'mawbima' puwathpathata thama tharuna peramune prashansawa pala karana bawa pawasu shantha bandara mahatha ewani iranamakata goduru wu ape rate ranawiruwan dahas gananakata rata wenuwen thama kala yuthukamata ayithiwasikam dina ganime manga padena bawa pereda (19da) shri lanka nidahas paksha mulasthanaye pawathi madhya hamuwedi sandahan keleya.
palathpalana mathiwaranaya pawathwanne kawadada, yana prashnaya me dinawala deshapalana karaliye menma samajaye wiwidha parshwayan athara kathabahata lakwa thibenawa.
rate pawathina nithiyata anuwa daruwan pasal yawima mawpiyange ho owunge bharakaruwange wagakimaya.

un ela kollan kiya madhawa kiyanneya!
